headline: Can Digital Retail & E-Commerce Boost Procter & Gamble's Volume?
summary: Can PG's push into digital retail and e-commerce reignite volume growth? Strong brands, data and AI may turn online discovery into incremental sales.

headline: Walmart Livestream And Sustainability Recognition Shape Procter And Gamble Story
summary: Walmart and Procter & Gamble (NYSE:PG) are collaborating on a shoppable livestream event tied to the Winter Olympics, allowing viewers to buy P&G products in real time. The event blends entertainment and commerce by using the Olympic setting to connect household brands with viewers during a major global sports moment. Separately, P&G Chief Sustainability Officer Virginie Helias has been named among the world's top sustainability leaders, recognizing the company's work in this area. For you...

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Procter & Gamble (PG) Analyst Upgrades Amid Insider Stock Sales
summary: In early February 2026, Procter & Gamble reported fiscal second-quarter earnings that slightly exceeded earnings per share expectations while falling short on revenue, alongside a series of executive stock sales led by Executive Chairman Jon Moeller totaling roughly US$28.10 million. At the same time, multiple major analysts raised their views on the company, emphasizing confidence in P&G’s growth and margin potential despite these insider transactions. Analysts’ willingness to turn more...

headline: Tide Unveils World-First Laundry Breakthrough: Introducing Tide evo, the Fiber-Detergent Tile
summary: CINCINNATI, February 17, 2026--Tide®, America’s #1 trusted laundry detergent brand, continues to deliver an unmatched level of clean. With the national launch of Tide evo – a 100% concentrated, waterless tile with six cleaning layers – Tide is introducing an entirely new product format that addresses modern consumers’ everyday laundry needs and preferences.
